title: Microwave-Fried Shallots
source: A Very Chinese Cookbook - Kevin Pang
categories: A Very Chinese Cookbook - Kevin Pang
directions: 1. Combine shallots and oil in a medium bowl. Microwave for 5 minutes.
2. Stir and continue to microwave 2 minutes longer.
3. Repeat stirring and microwaving in 2-minute increments until beginning to brown (4 to 6 minutes).
4. Repeat stirring and microwaving in 30-second increments until deep golden brown (30 seconds to 2 minutes).
5. Using a slotted spoon, transfer shallots to a paper towel–lined plate; season with salt to taste.
6. Let drain and crisp, about 5 minutes.
